title: Bring Shen Skins out of the vault for Mortal Kombat X
body: I think that Riot should take the Yellow Jacket and Frozen Shen skins out of the vault for the release of the new Mortal Kombat game {{champion:98}}

replies.body: honestly my fave MK was number 3 xD going old school

For some reason the new Mortal Kombat does not look as appealing. Maybe it is the better graphics, maybe I am older, but the newer fatalities are less funny and more gross than before. And I loved MK 9.
